text: the main rule those who agreed with the following conditions may use this software
those who wont agree with them should stop using this software and should remove the files related to this software from the memory media they are using
the conditions imposed on managers the managers own the following rights related to this software

the right to modify this software   the right to distribute this software   the right to let this software used   the right to devolve the part or the whole of the rights related to this software the managers have a duty to resolve malfunctions of this software
the managers have no responsibility for any damages the users may cause and may sustain
the conditions imposed on users a user has the following duties on using this software   the duty to pay a fee to the developers based on the consideration regulation described below
to protect the rights of the managers   to protect the rights of others
a user has a right to use this software for any purpose provided the usage wont violate any other conditions
